website_summaries.verdict: This sports bra offers comfortable and complete coverage for all sizes. The best out there for durable material and endurance against sweat.
pros: Comes in a variety of colors
Offers significant support across all chest sizes
Made of durable material that stands the test of time and wicks moisture well
Offers full coverage and straps rest comfortably on shoulders
cons: Fit is meant to be tight
If looser fit is preferred, size up

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my need
customer_reviews.text: Being a 71 year old a man 18 years Post-Bypass I have had my chest plate open between the 2nd and 3rd ribs ( wire still there ) causing the bones to rub when working out. My Cardiologist wrote me a scrip for a $168 support, his nurse told me to save my money and buy this support bra for the compression to prevent movement. Works great ! No pain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Sports Bra!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 34B and I currently own 3 of the Nike Sports Bras in the size small. Other reviewers thought it ran small but I found that it fit just as expected. It is tight, but not too clingy and is great for running.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie

customer_reviews.title: Big Boobs Rejoice!
customer_reviews.text: As a 34DDD, it's REALLY hard to find a bra to run anything from 5Ks to Marathons in with breaking the bank or causing some seriously sore boobs in the trail process. The bra offers great compression with minimal movement. Yes, it's tight, but I'd rather 1 bra be tight than 2 bras (doubling up sucks) suffocating me. I've been using this exact version for 6+ years now an will never try another until forced to do so. Love them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Order true size for intense activity, order up for milder exercise
customer_reviews.text: I personally do not like wearing super-tight sports bras. I'm 5'2", 108 pounds, 34A cup and I originally ordered a small. The small was very constricting and perfect for intense exercise like running. However, I wanted to wear it regularly (and I didn't want the constant tight feel) so I returned the small and ordered a medium. The medium definitely is looser and would not work well for running, but is perfect for light to moderate activity (yoga, cardio) and daily wear. Overall, if you're participating in strenuous or intense activity like a marathon, order your true size for maximum support. If you just want to wear it day-to-day like me without feeling constricted, order a size up.
customer_reviews.author: Xu

customer_reviews.title: Favourite Sports Bra
customer_reviews.text: I am a 34 D/DD, I got the medium and I am satisfied with the fit. The bra offers good support (I wear it for running, aerobics class, spin class and HIIT workouts). I have washed it several times and find it to be very durable. Worth the money, would definitely repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Christena Whyte

customer_reviews.title: Supports "the girls" and my fitness goals
customer_reviews.text: Sports bras should be easy, but so often they're not. The NIKE Victory Compession is awesome! Here's why: 1) It fits perfectly! It compresses well and gives "the girls" just-right support--without making me feel like I'm stuffed into a sausage casing or bound by a tourniquet. What a gift! 2) The fabric feels good on. It's smooth without being slippery, and there's zero chafing. 3) It doesn't have a bunch of extra stuff. I can't stand the sports bras with zippers (owwww!) or unnecessarty pads that end up crumpled into a wad after one wash. It's a one-piece, no-fuss, perfectly supportive sports bra. I'm not a NIKE loyalist, but this sports bra makes me think maybe I should be.
customer_reviews.author: Liz ZélandaisTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Too big and found out that Nike donates mostly to Republicans
customer_reviews.text: So I'm normally a XL for DD+ but this was huge on me. Ordered Nike to support them but then I read they donate mostly to Republicans so I won't be buying Nike again.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Love Them!
customer_reviews.text: I am well endowed and had Under Amour sports bras that I loved. I switched to these and love them. They are better quality at the waist. I purchased 3 of the 2XL—I already had 2 of the XL. The XL’s fit, but I decided to try the 2 XL’s because I didn’t want them too tight—they aren’t. Now I have 2 sizes for different activities. I’ll use the XL’s when I want more support. I wear a 38 DDD from Cacique—Lane Bryant.
customer_reviews.author: M Jones

customer_reviews.title: Exciting Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect fit and it feels amazing and comfortable 😍
customer_reviews.author: O'Neilla Brown

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I like this sports bra a lot. Wasn't sure exactly what size to order after reading the reviews. I wear a 38C and went with the XL. It fits great - not too binding and very comfortable, yet it still holds everything in place.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: order a size down!!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so I'm a 34D (sized by Victoria's Secret, so I know this is my correct bra size). I really wanted to pack the gals down because I play soccer and like to work out, and I'm tired of them bouncing when I run. So, obviously a D cup is usually a large, but I ordered a medium. The medium fits flawlessly, holds everything up, and prevents bouncing. It looks like I'm a C now lol :) So if you want a tighter hold, order a size down.
customer_reviews.author: fluffypancakesss

customer_reviews.title: Great running sports bra!
customer_reviews.text: For those of you wondering what the support and coverage is like with this bra..... I’m a runner and a size C cup and this bra provides more than just medium support for me. I think if you were larger busted, D cups size on up, then this would fall under the medium support category and things might get a little crowded for you. I like this bra style, because it has more coverage in the back. I also like where the shoulder straps are placed. And the dry-fit that Nike makes is hard to beat. It’s good quality material and stands up to vigorous activity. I highly recommend if you are active and a C cup and under.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Girl

customer_reviews.title: Low Support!
customer_reviews.text: This is very low support but otherwise made well. I am a 36 DD and I ordered the large and it fit as expected. Not really for the large chested for hard core exercising. But maybe for lounging around the house, walking, yoga, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Jimberley W.

customer_reviews.title: nike victory dri-fit
customer_reviews.text: I read another person's review, and it does seem slightly tight upon first try, but she said it worked out in the end. I have the C cup at this point in life, and am about 20 lbs overweight. I have been searching for a bra to hold the girls up, and not push them to the side. This bra did it. Finally, something I can leave the house in. This bra is especially good for people who are short. The regular is a nice size that doesn't stretch from shoulder to belly button. They even have a selection for tall women.
customer_reviews.author: T.L.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this kind of sports bra. I wear a 38D and I got a L. It fits very well and supports me during cardio. I have 3 in different colors. The color is true to the picture and I’ve washed this several times after a few months and it’s still vibrant, and no signs of wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Honeybee8206

customer_reviews.title: High quality, high impact
customer_reviews.text: I finally decided to purchase more of these after I realized no other sports bras seem to provide the support these do. I’m a textbook small everywhere except my chest (32DDD), but a small fits perfectly. Obviously a little tight, but not uncomfortable and does the job for high impact workouts. I’ve had my old one for 4-5 years with no problems, so I know they’ll last and are worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Love these sports bras!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only sports bra that I can find that I like. It has a little give so it’s comfortable for everyday wear (going to class or to work). It also has enough support to workout in. Being in college, this is the perfect sports bra because I can head straight to the gym without the need for an outfit change at the end of the day because it offers enough support for running while enough comfort for all day use. Only issue is that the sides in the back slip down and I have to pull them back up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holding it together.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a firm 38 DDD and the XL fit me perfectly. I love the way it feels on, I love the way it looks on - creates amazing cleavage- and it absolutely holds everything in. I ordered cheaper Haines her way sports bras, and my boobs were hanging and bouncing all over the place while on the treadmill and Elliptical. These hold EVERYTHING into place without cutting into your back or shoulders. I just ordered 2 more. Thanks for another amazing product Nike! ;)
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Threading came undone in one wash
customer_reviews.text: I love Nike! Absolutely everything about them, however when I got this sports bra, I washed it one time and the threading completely came undone on one side. Do NOT buy!
customer_reviews.author: Mommyof3

customer_reviews.title: No side boobs.
customer_reviews.text: Material: 5 stars. Fit: 5 stars. Look: 5 stars. It’s a great buy! I am 34A and I got a Small. The fit is great. It’s long in torso area so kinda looks like a tanker top. But I am just 5’3’’ so maybe it would not look like that on taller people. I have grown chest and back muscles in 3 months of bulking, and the original bra is giving me side boobs while the bottom area fits. No side boobs with this bra and the bottom part fits well. Flattering.
customer_reviews.author: Ooospy

customer_reviews.title: It's a really good one!
customer_reviews.text: This sports bra is surprisingly soft and comfortable! It provides a firm support but is not too compressive. The seams are well constructed and do not dig into the skin. I feel adequately covered but still breathable. I had breast reconstruction so finding a good fit with support has been rather difficult. I typically don't even consider Nike, but I will definitely order another of these.
customer_reviews.author: Brianne

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect fit! A little tight in the beginning but felt comfortable enough after about 10 minutes ... most importantly, they hold the boobies tight with very little movement which is perfect for running. I'm a 34B and i purchased an S. Will definitely purchase again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Fifi

customer_reviews.title: Great for running
customer_reviews.text: I love this bra. Nike doesn't fail me when it comes to apparel. I love to run and I like the girls to be very supported, as in not moving at all. With all the craze in low impact activity like yoga it's been harder for me to find a support bra with enough support for runners. I'm also 20 weeks pregnant so my cup size increased by a full size and with the extra volume I need extra support. This bra provides plenty of support without having to size down and squeeze in. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sweets_87

customer_reviews.title: My favorite sports bra by far!!!
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite sport bras!!! First of all I love Nike bras in general, but this one is a bigger longer than most. It’s super comfortable and holds the girls in tight, but not so tight it gets painful. I use this bra running, Beachbody and weights and I love it. As a reference I am a 36D and own it in large.
customer_reviews.author: Annica B

customer_reviews.title: Not washable
customer_reviews.text: Amazon is a company that gives little to no hassle with orders. Whether it be a replacement or return. In saying that, I've never left a negative review until now. The fit was uncomfortable, there isn't a lot of compression (i need it because i have a larger bust), i wore it ONCE then washed it. Now the material is a complete mess to the point that i can't explain it properly, but it's unusable. I'm disappointed because i really wanted to use this sports bra. Now i have to go on the hunt AGAIN for a decent sports bra. Better luck next time i guess.
customer_reviews.author: Nelly

customer_reviews.title: Good supportive sports bra
customer_reviews.text: I personally love Nike sports bras. I am not sure how people with larger breast feel, but for me being a 34C, I think the support this sports bra provides is great. I am a gym rat, and I have VERY intense workouts, so I need good support where my breasts are not flopping all around making me uncomfortable. This sports bra does a good job at holding the girls in place!
customer_reviews.author: JRose

customer_reviews.title: Very nice fit.
customer_reviews.text: Fit is very comfortable. Doesn't dig into the shoulders, it is fairly easy to put on and get into place, and then it is comfortable for several hours of tennis. The navy blue works well with the Nike racer back tanks with the skinny back ... showing the navy blue of the bra makes it look like part of the top.
customer_reviews.author: J. Langley

customer_reviews.title: favorite sports bra!!
customer_reviews.text: After having a breast reduction surgery, I was required to wear a supportive sports bra. Months later, this is still one of my favorite bras to wear. It's perfect for lifting and medium impact exercise. I've always been impressed with Nike products but this surpassed my expectations with how comfortable it was, even on my surgical incisions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold well
customer_reviews.text: I searched for sports bras with high impact support. This one came up and having had good luck with other Nike sports bras, I figured I'd give it a try. This was not high impact support (I know it says it in the description, but it came up as top result in the search), and I don't find it to have much compression. I don't have the tags for this any more, but I'd like to send it back. It doesn't hold me at all.
customer_reviews.author: Boston Designer

customer_reviews.title: Had to guess the size but I was pretty dead on because it fits her perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item just as a little gift for my girlfriend awhile back. Had to guess the size but I was pretty dead on because it fits her perfectly. She was stoked when I gave it to her and uses it all the time for the gym. She says its very comfortable and unlike some other bras that tear on the seems she says she can tell its made very well and is most of all comfortable. Sizes were as expected and color was the same as pictured. She tells me she wants more so here comes another order!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and comfortable. Used for long-distance running and jiu jitsu. I got a smaller size to ensure adequate compression, and I thought it was great. Just a little too thin for my preference, so I’ve switched to a lightly padded Nike bra. :)
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Terrible - maybe faulty stitching?
customer_reviews.text: I have owned a lot of Nike bras prior to this one and never had any issues. The seaming on the inside left chest seemed to be faulty as it chaffed me in a way I had never experienced (it actually made me bleed right under my breast!) during a short run. I tried wearing it once more to the gym and had the same issue. Not sure if this is how Nike makes this particular bra, or if this once had faulty construction. Either way, I threw it out and had a terrible experience with it!
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: my chest isn’t going ANYWHERE in this!!
customer_reviews.text: they weren’t kidding when they said compression! it fits tight like it is supposed to though that means it digs into your shoulders. if i wear for longer than an hour i get a neck and back ache. but for short term exercise it is fine. my chest isn’t going ANYWHERE in this!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah K

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: This sports bra is comfortable and the fabric is good quality. After receiving it I ordered a second one. I’m a 36C and got the medium. The medium (for a 36C) provides a tight fit but gives me the support I want as I run daily and do CrossFit.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good bra for price
customer_reviews.text: I needed a good supportive running bra after augmentation and this one was pretty cheap but good quality. I don’t like buying Nike because of the kaper-d*** ordeal but the price was hard to beat. Havnt run in it yet. I feel like I’ll still need to double up. I’m a 34DD and I got a medium.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: there was nothing wrong with the bra
customer_reviews.text: This was the first time I ordered a sports bra on line and the one I chose was too small, so I returned it. It looked like it was well made. I gave it three stars, but in this case stars had nothing to do the situation.
customer_reviews.author: Barney

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: This may be my new favorite sports bra! Purchased based on great reviews of others and to replace some older bras that were worn out. Have gone on two jogs and stayed comfortable and in place. For reference I'm 36 C (almost D) and ordered large.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Far too small, Might Want to Size Up
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last year, and while it does a great job holding in your lady parts during a strenuous jog, it is far too small. I am a tiny gal, 5'2" and 110 pounds, and it is so difficult to get off. After half a day of classes, biking, and MMA, I already feel uncomfortable and constricted. I would definitely get a medium next time I were to purchase a Nike sports bra. It is my last resort of a sports bra in my collection, when the others are in the wash.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Came apart after one wash...
customer_reviews.text: This sports bra is great...BUT after one wash the underband came unsewn. It is so tight that I can fold it under and still get great use of it but it I feel a little ripped off by the poor quality of the sewing. Maybe I just got an off one?
customer_reviews.author: Marvelous Mrs.

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing these bras for years now. The black ones seem to be made of a firmer fabric than the other colors so they give better support and are less likely to stretch out with age.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This bra is very comfortable and the support is exactly what I wanted for a running sports bra. I ordered a small and usually wear a 30DD in normal bras.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Conger

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit and hurts.
customer_reviews.text: This product looks like its solidly made and would be awesome if it fit! I bought a small. I'm a 130 pound 5'5" regularly a B cup woman. My daughter is 5'1" and is 106 pounds and wears a A cup. Neither of us could fit into this sports bra. She got it on at least but it hurt, cutting into her shoulders and back, and had to take it off. I couldn't get it on. I'm not taking a chance in returning it for a bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: AnnELiz

customer_reviews.title: Compression fit
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a medium and it way too small so I ordered the large and sadly it fits perfectly. I’m surprised to be wearing a large sports bra however I have to remind my self it is a Nike compression bra made of the DriFit material
customer_reviews.author: maryjane

customer_reviews.title: Great if they just dried a bit!
customer_reviews.text: Nike generally makes products that last a long time and are good quality. I liked that I could get sizes that I expected would fit, and they do. The appearance is great. I just wish they wicked sweat more and dried more quickly. The material is pretty thick so they stay quite saturated.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie R

customer_reviews.title: This is for moderate impact and is very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bra. It is comfortable to wear even when I am not working out and looks really cute on. I originally purchased this for running because I didn't see anywhere in the description whether it was for high impact or not ( it showed up when I searched for high impact sports bra). I did notice when I received it though that the tags specify "moderate impact". I decided to keep it based on how nice it looked and comfortable it was. I wear it for lighter working out and sometimes even when I'm not working out!
customer_reviews.author: J & B

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting high quality
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bra. I have always bought this style of Nike sports bras and I am so happy to have been able to add a few more. I have some that have lasted 8 years and are still in great shape. Will definitely be buying a few more now that I know Amazon has the same high quality Nike products as Nikes website does
customer_reviews.author: E R

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, full support
customer_reviews.text: Amazing , full support . I cannot believe it gave such great support without being padded . The only set back it is Diggs into my late a little because it is a little high on the back of my under arm . Perfect for HIT training
customer_reviews.author: Sara M

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great sports bra. I wear it doubled with a Hanes sports bra. The 2 together hold me in great for working out. Full C. I like that it doesn't have cups, but it has some padding.
customer_reviews.author: Eloise Rubenstein

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared to have no breasts.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t read this was a compression bra. If you want to be compressed, then this bra is for you. It smashed everything down so flat. I’m 5’1, 34C and it made me a 34A. I’m returning it because it’s not what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Compression prefect. Just need Nike and every sports bra company to hear us n making the pants not removeable so I don’t have to fish them from the laundry pile
customer_reviews.author: kaylee

customer_reviews.title: Thinner material and not as supportive
customer_reviews.text: Not the same bras I got a few years ago. Same size, same style, but material is much thinner and not nearly as supportive as my old bras are. I'll keep them for yoga sessions, but these are absolutely not good for light running or other medium impact activities.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: If your looking for support, I wouldn't recommend this
customer_reviews.text: I am a 36 DD. It fits but my babies still bounce around in there. No real good support. Its not tight.
customer_reviews.author: Gaby

customer_reviews.title: It works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I've passed on purchasing this bra before because it says that it is only a medium control sports bra and I need maximum control for Jazzercise and to keep areas scarred as a result of breast cancer surgery from jostling (very painful). This time, I decided to try it out anyways. It works like a charm. Great support and comfortable. I will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great bra, order your regular size.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a size up based on other reviews about the compression in the bra. Sadly, it fit like a regular sports bra, no extra compression and was too big. Hate to return because of the great value, but completely useless because it's too big. Will def. reorder in a smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: crystal beverly

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, great material.
customer_reviews.text: If you're like me you've purchased many sports bras only to be disappointed in the material and fit. Even department stores don't carry a full line of sports bras. I bought this one because of the label.... Nike. I am not disappointed. It's a very good material, not loose and not revealing. It is a snug fit. Perfect for exercise and everyday use. It's a quality bra, and I'm picky. You won't be disappointed with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Movie Night Streaming

customer_reviews.title: fine for around the house
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping it would be more compressing. I definitely can't wear it to work out but I have a pretty big chest. It's comfortable for around the house though
customer_reviews.author: pinkmist

customer_reviews.title: this one is good for just around the house or a sleep bra ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a different bra nike makes...the nike women's pro is the tighter one i wanted for working out i guess. this one is good for just around the house or a sleep bra though.
customer_reviews.author: Tori Beachem

customer_reviews.title: Great sports bra
customer_reviews.text: This sports bra is perfect for my volleyball-playing daughter. It is her favorite sports bra, and it has held up great with machine washing. She wears a black tank over it, so the bra is fashionable too.
customer_reviews.author: Anna C.

customer_reviews.title: Changes to be aware of: cheaper material with less support
customer_reviews.text: I've been a frequent buying of this sports bra for several years due to its compression and quality construction; however, the bra being sent now is low quality and cheap. I've purchased and returned two sports bras because of this change, but have found that the Dri-Fit version advertised is no longer the one being sent out. If you want low to medium support with cheaper material, then this is the sports bra for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Sports Bra!
customer_reviews.text: True to size and so comfortable! My favorite sports bra ever! Only downside for me is the Nike check logo started almost immediately cracking and breaking and coming off after first wash.
customer_reviews.author: dani

customer_reviews.title: Order up a size
customer_reviews.text: It fit very small. I would order up a size next time
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Heck yeah!
customer_reviews.text: I am 127 pound female, 5’6, and wear a 36B bra. I wear a medium. Very good quality for the price. They last forever! But your boobs do compress down, so if you like big cleavage this is sooo not for you.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I’m a 36DD and I ordered a large. It fits perfect. Immediately wore it to the gym and worked out for an hour on the treadmill, elliptical, and bike. Everything stayed where it was supposed to, and it was comfortable. Definitely not high level compression, but better than the average sports bra
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Very tight, not stretchy
customer_reviews.text: Why I understand this is a compression bra, it has no flexibility in any direction. It was hard to breathe wearing it and it provided no support. I wear 36A bras and the medium was way too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Maria K.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, supportive
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable and supportive but was tight along the waist. Extra points for the sweat band style fabric that lined the waistband.
customer_reviews.author: Parker T

customer_reviews.title: Great bra!!
customer_reviews.text: Great support - excellent for hiking - modest enough that you can go bra only without feeling naked.
customer_reviews.author: Spumanti

customer_reviews.title: Great for intense cardio for us "top heavy" girls. ;)
customer_reviews.text: I love this compression bra. HOWEVER, I don't understand why the pink one is a third of the cost of a white one.........
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great workout bra option!
customer_reviews.text: This bra is a great option for working out. It is comfortable, but a bit pricey. I’d recommend this, but it’s not as thick of a material as I’d expect. It also isn’t as supportive as I’d expect (I use mostly for high impact activity).
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Holds the XL girls in!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 38DDD and have the hardest time finding a bra to work out in, especially running. I got an XL and this both supported me, was comfortable, and the only kind of bouncing when I was running was a slight side to side action, also no uni-boob!
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Carpenter-Perry

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it just for the brand name
customer_reviews.text: This is no better than a cheap bra from target. It’s really tight and doesn’t have much breathing room.
customer_reviews.author: Tnefaub

customer_reviews.title: These are the best bras! I have them in several colors and ...
customer_reviews.text: These are the best bras! I have them in several colors and they are very comfortable and offer great support. I wear them while doing cardio and strength training. The dri-fit technology also keeps you comfortable and... well... dry! I'm a 34D and wear a Medium. It's definitely tight, but when I tried the large the band was too wide around my rib cage.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Feakins

customer_reviews.title: Too neon yellow looking
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping these were as green or lime colored as the pictures show, but no, it was really yellow. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: DeAquitaine

customer_reviews.title: Order a size larger than advised here!
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure this bra has good compression but the sizing for this product was incorrect. I bought a medium (34 D) and it was just too small. Order a size larger!!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Chappy

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Was a little bigger for a size small, but is comfy and I still have it three years later.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Ann wolfe

customer_reviews.title: No better sports bra!
customer_reviews.text: Great bras for sports! My daughter plays volleyball, basketball and softball and these have made it through it all and she is very picky (aren't we all) when it comes to bras! Love these and these are are "go to bras" for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly D.

customer_reviews.title: Good for a year or so
customer_reviews.text: This was awesome for almost a year. Then it lost it stretch and the Nike logo peeled off.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy9Lee

customer_reviews.title: I returned it but I think its a good bra for people that are not looking for a ...
customer_reviews.text: This barely provided support by itself. I am a size medium on my other sports bras so I got this one in a size medium also (I am a 34DD). It was very loose on me I would have to wear it on top of another bra if i wanted it to provide support. I returned it but I think its a good bra for people that are not looking for a lot of support.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Super snug too
customer_reviews.text: This is a little small. Super snug too, which kind of helps. These bras are great quality and I love the material but my activity is lower at the gym due to the support. I'm a 36 DD and definitely need more support.
customer_reviews.author: Yaz

customer_reviews.title: Great support!
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, holds my 32DD's up well when jogging. Great support!
customer_reviews.author: GGirl

customer_reviews.title: Very supportive and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 34D and usually have a problem with too much bounce when jogging, but this bra held everything in place -- it feels snug without feeling too constricting.
customer_reviews.author: Marie-Therese

customer_reviews.title: Perfect work out bra!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect work out bra! Cool and snug at the same time. Been looking for this in stores as I got one years ago and haven't been able to find another like it. This is exactly what I wanted and was delivered quickly. 36 D and large is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Could barely get it on, way too small. Need to exchange for bigger size
customer_reviews.author: Amber Britton

customer_reviews.title: soft, comfy and does the job!
customer_reviews.text: I always wanted to try this bra but was nervous because it seemed so thin so I finally decided to order it after hearing my friend talk highly about it. Her and I are both D's and I can't believe how amazing this sports bra was. It's thing but does not show any lines and holds them in place. It's very form fitting and sucks you right in. I loved it so much that a week later, I ordered another one!
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a sports bra should
customer_reviews.text: Fits like a sports bra should. I bought a small and I'm 32/34 A/B and I'm happy with the fit. Band on bottom is thick but not too thick. The Nike symbol will probably peel off after a while but haven't had any issue after a few washes.
customer_reviews.author: Violet

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite sports bras
customer_reviews.text: Nike's sports bras are my absolute FAVORITE. Super comfortable, don't get stretched out, last for years, and hold your boobs in place perfectly. I own 3 of them because I love them so much!
customer_reviews.author: Rae AM

customer_reviews.title: These are the best, most supportive sports bras ever
customer_reviews.text: These are the best, most supportive sports bras ever. I wear a 34B and usually a size Small shirts, and the Medium fits perfectly snug on me. I got the white color, and it is not see-through at all.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Pinsonat

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waist your money fell apart after 3 uses
customer_reviews.text: Only wore 3 times and the stitching attached to the elastic came completely undone making it not wearable. I wonder if this is a true Nike product or a knock off? As we have purchase Nike products for the last 30 years and have never had a problem
customer_reviews.author: Kit Jory

customer_reviews.title: If you need high impact and have any thing above a 38C you need these Nike Bras.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a Goalkeeper so she needs high impact sports bras and Nike is perfect for her. She is a 44DD.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best sports bra
customer_reviews.text: I love these because they don’t have cups that shift around everywhere. Yes, this will give you a uniboob. But it’s a sports bra, what do you expect.
customer_reviews.author: Colette R.

customer_reviews.title: I love this sport bra
customer_reviews.text: I love this sport bra! It is my favorite. I wanted something to wear for high impact sport, and this is the perfect size. I bought a small, for high intensity, I would have bought a medium for any other cases. Love it! I will soon buy it in another color as well!
customer_reviews.author: Giulia

customer_reviews.title: Stitching unravels
customer_reviews.text: The stitching/seams began unraveling after about 3 wears/washes. Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Too tight just in the front. Can't breath after moderate exercising for only 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Nike is just great.
customer_reviews.text: I love these Nike sorts bras. Always have. I have bigger shoulders and basically no boobs so finding a sports bra that doesn’t make my traps cramp is kinda difficult. I have to size up, I’m 5,7, 150lbs and normally get mediums but a large fits great letting my lungs open up while I run.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Denger

customer_reviews.title: It's Nike, so you know the quality
customer_reviews.text: This fit well and has good product life....what you should expect from NIKE.
customer_reviews.author: J. LO

customer_reviews.title: Fits wonderfully!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two sizes, one medium and one large, as I'm a bit of an in-between size. The large is perfect for yoga class and the medium is perfect for running!
customer_reviews.author: Erica Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Great Compression
customer_reviews.text: Running gets easier and more fun with the right gears.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size received. Good quality when they fit
customer_reviews.text: I ordered four of these all the same size but one arrived fitting much smaller than the others although it was labeled the same size. I love these sports bras and only wear this kind however was disappointed for how pricy bras can be to recieve one that did not fit and am now stuck with it but cannot use
customer_reviews.author: Alphaj07

customer_reviews.title: provides the support you need while still protecting you from lookin lik a hoe
customer_reviews.text: Im a 34D and I ordered a medium and it fits perfectly! not too tight and not too big. One of the most comfortable sports bras ive ever had. I usually hate that sports bras make my boobs super revealing and they look like theyre about to spill but this is like a cut off tanktop which I love. It provides the support you need while still protecting you from lookin lik a hoe
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: It fit very snugly (almost too tight) but that was good for support during aerobic exercise
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear this bra in a size Medium as a 34D. It fit very snugly (almost too tight) but that was good for support during aerobic exercise. When I got pregnant, I ordered this bra in a size Large because my cup size got larger. I'm now a 34F. The bra fits around my breasts but unfortunately the band at the bottom is too loose and doesn't fit snugly around my rib cage. The colors are great though - I have this in white (with black swoosh) and neon yellow.
customer_reviews.author: ATP

customer_reviews.title: The keep the girls in place
customer_reviews.text: No bounce and the bra is comfortable too if you get the right size i.e. M for 32 D. I like that I dont have to worry about padding and support. I bought 2 more.
customer_reviews.author: Sheek003

product_meta.title: Nike Women's Victory Compression Sports Bra
product_meta.description: The Nike Women's Victory Compression Sports Bra utilizes a secure fit with medium support for a variety of training activities. Sports bra straps create stabilizing tension, helping to minimize bounce during multidirectional movement.
feature_bullets: COMPRESSION & SUPPORT: The Nike sports bra for women utilizes a snug compression fit, providing medium support for a variety of training activities.
RACERBACK DESIGN: Straps create stabilizing tension, helping to minimize bounce during multidirectional movement. The sports bras' racerback straps allow for a full range of motion.
JERSEY MATERIAL: The Nike sports bra has an outer body and inner lining made of jersey material. The sports bra pulls sweat away from the skin to keep you dry and comfortable.
COMFORTABLE FIT: The women's sports bra has an elastic encased chest band that feels soft against the skin and provides a secure and comfortable fit.
NIKE SPORTS BRA: Machine wash, imported, fabric: 88% polyester/12% spandex. Recommended for female athletes who wear an A, B, C or D bra cup size. There are no removable pads.
